+------------+--------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------+ | Year | Cources | University | Grades/Scores | +============+==================================================+=========================================================================+======================+ | 2023-2025 | Masters in Data Science | The University of Arizona, Tucson, Arizona, United States | Yet to be calculated | +------------+--------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------+ | 2017- 2021 | B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering | Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India | 8.78 | | | | | | | | | | (CGPA out of 10) | +------------+--------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------+ | 2017 | All Indian Senior School Certificate Examination | St. Joseph's Co-Ed, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India | 78.9% | | | | | | | | | | (Percentage) | +------------+--------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------+ | 2015 | All India Secondary School Examination | St. Joseph's Co-Ed, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India | 9.6 | | | | | | | | | | (CGPA out of 10) | +------------+--------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------+ ## Skills & Abilities: ::: columns ::: {.column width="70%"} ### Capgemini Pvt. Ltd. Capgemini is an MNC, headquartered in Paris, France. The company has multiple offices across the globe. I have worked as a Software Engineer for Capgemini PVT. LTD. (India Location). - Worked on 3 projects, owned by the clients from UK, Canada and Australia. - Have development experience on Salesforce marketing cloud. - Involved in detail design phase, which involved reviewing the user stories. - Experience in journey Creation. - Responsible for creating personalised emails and dynamic contents using AMP Script - Created Landing pages and web forms via SFMC Cloud Pages - Worked on scheduled and file drop automations in Automation Studio - Have experience in API package creation and connecting Postman with SFMC. - Worked with SQL to make required changes in the Data Extensions. ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ```{=html} 
From July 2021 to August 2023
``` ::: ::: ::: columns ::: {.column width="70%"} ### Capgemini Pvt. Ltd. I did my internship with the Capgemini PVT. LTD. - Did my internship in the .NET frameworks. - Completed a project provided by the Company to create a dynamic desktop application using .NET frameworks. ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ```{=html} 
From January 2021 to May 2021
``` ::: ::: ::: columns ::: {.column width="70%"} ### SmartUp SmartUp is a tech start-up which hires students from college and teach them about web development and professionalism. - Responsible for working on-front end, using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. - Guide a team of interns in the development of LearnScript, an Android application project. - LearnScript is a platform for learn how to code. - The app contains videos lectures and documentation of various coding languages. ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ```{=html} 
From January 2021 to May 2021
``` ::: ::: ## Projects: ### Argus ARGUS is a website that I single-handedly developed, embodying my days of hard work in the realm of photography. - It contains the collection of clicked photos of various prime locations of India - The website was made using HTML, CSS and JS ### GLOBETROTTER Globetrotter is a web-application which automates the guide booking system - It is made using HTML, CSS and JS for front-end - Java was used for the back-end. - The application will allow the remote booking of travel guides like cab booking. ## Co-curricular Activities: ### NGOs - Worked with Radha Krishna Educational Society from September 2020 to May 2021 - Conduction classes for students of 10th and 12th - Food and Cloths distribution. - Booking online slots for Covid vaccine ### NCC - Appointed as NCC Sergeant in 2015 - Participated in Republic Day parade in Bhopal in 2015. ### Miscellaneous - Achieved \'A\' level certificate in NCC. - Nominated as the Class Representative of student council 2017-2021 - Conducted mock interview for computer science branch in year 2019-2020. - Part of college Basket Ball and swimming teams. ## Achievements: ### SFMC - Marketing Cloud Email Specialist ### Swimming - Awarded first prize in inter school swimming competition - Participated in inter-college swimming competition ## Area of Interests: - Blades and Guns - Photography - Traveling - Swimming
